{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Siemens |model=SS2524 |revision= |upc=609838003568 |asin=B00008GK6Q |price=160 |est_release_date=02/03/2003 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router, Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=M4Y-000325 |pwr_v=120 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=60 |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |wi1_module=Z-Com LANEscape/APDL-325 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3873B |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-MMCX |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=HomePlug 1.0 |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=SpeedStream |default_ssid_regex=^SpeedStream$ |default_ip=192.168.254.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|SpeedStream Powerline Wireless DSL/Cable Router}} :[http://web.archive.org/web/20030124022455/http://www.speedstream.com/support/2524main.html Useless support page] (via archive.org) :[http://web.archive.org/web/20030308081324/http://www.speedstream.com/support/pdf/2524_datasheet.pdf Datasheet] (via archive.org)
*[http://ec1.images-amazon.com/media/i3d/01/A/man-migrate/MANUAL000008840.pdf Manual] (via Amazon) â€¢ [https://www.cnet.com/uk/products/siemens-speedstream-2524-powerline-wireless-dsl-cable-router/specs/ Specifications] :The manual seems like typical ''[[SerComm]]'' fare. {{see also|Siemens SS2624 v1|Siemens SS2624 v2}} :This is presumed to be a ''[[SerComm]]'' device.
*'''Transmit power''' (identical to the [[Siemens SS2624]]) :13dBm (typical) *'''Receiver sensitivity''' (identical to the [[Siemens SS2624]]) :-80dBm minimum Per the manual, the default HomePlug network password is '''SpeedStream'''.
*[http://www.netstumbler.org/hardware/xi-325-help-t13508.html NetStumbler.org thread noting the FCC ID] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20030419182522/http://www.80211-planet.com/reviews/AP/article.php/2192051 802.11 Planet review of the device] :$159.99, 4 out of 5 stars
